price: Na ninawapururia muhula; hakika hila zangu ni imara.
footnotes: Na nitawapa muhula kwa kuiakharisha adhabu. Hakika mipango yangu ni ya nguvu, na hawezi kuporonyoka yeyote akasalimika nayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
